title: Hellfire Treads
summaries: The Hellfire Treads are a pre-Hardmode accessory that give the wearer the ability to walk on all liquids and have immunity to lava damage for 7 seconds upon contact. It also reduces lava's base damage from 80 to 35.

The Hellfire Treads are functionally identical to the Lava Waders, except for the purely cosmetic trail of flames. Although the Hellfire Treads are a combination of two items, only one has actual effects. If equipped in a vanity slot, the trail of flames is still visible.

statistics.Tooltip:
Provides the ability to walk on water, honey & lava
Grants immunity to fire blocks and 7 seconds of immunity to lava
Reduces damage from touching lava
Leaves a trail of flames in your wake
statistics.Sell: 12
